name: H.Res.570 [117th]
text: - Commemorating the past success of the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams and supporting the United States Olympic and Paralympic Teams in the 2020 Olympic Games and Paralympic Games.

name: H.Res.569 [117th]
text: - Expressing continued solidarity with the Lebanese people after the devastating explosions at the Port of Beirut on August 4, 2020, and the continued efforts to form a secure, independent, and democratic Lebanon.

name: H.R.4417 [117th]
text: - Capping Drug Costs for Seniors Act of 2021

name: H.R.4415 [117th]
text: - Chester County Reversionary Interest Release Act

name: H.R.4419 [117th]
text: - To extend the pilot program on partnership agreements to construct new facilities for the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

name: H.R.4422 [117th]
text: - To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide special rules for purposes of determining if financial guaranty insurance companies are qualifying insurance corporations under the passive foreign investment company rules.

name: H.R.4420 [117th]
text: - United States Commitment to Peacekeeping Act of 2021

name: H.R.4308 [117th]
text: - Removing Federal Barriers to Offering of Mobile Wagers on Indian Lands Act

name: H.R.4329 [117th]
text: - Broadband Internet for Small Ports Act

name: H.R.4327 [117th]
text: - Protect American Trade Secrets Act of 2021

name: H.R.4333 [117th]
text: - To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to allow a deduction for investment advisory expenses of certain funeral and cemetery trusts during suspension of miscellaneous itemized deductions.

name: H.R.4328 [117th]
text: - To rename the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in San Angelo, Texas, the Colonel Charles and JoAnne Powell VA Clinic.
